member.name: JOBOBJECT_BASIC_PROCESS_ID_LIST
member.summary: Contains the process identifier list for a job object. If the job is nested, the process identifier list consists of all processes associated with the job and its child jobs.

member.name: JOBOBJECT_BASIC_PROCESS_ID_LIST.NumberOfAssignedProcesses
member.summary: The number of process identifiers to be stored in ProcessIdList.

member.name: JOBOBJECT_BASIC_PROCESS_ID_LIST.NumberOfProcessIdsInList
member.summary: The number of process identifiers returned in the ProcessIdList buffer. If this number is less than NumberOfAssignedProcesses, increase the size of the buffer to accommodate the complete list.

member.name: JOBOBJECT_BASIC_PROCESS_ID_LIST.ProcessIdList
member.summary: A variable-length array of process identifiers returned by this call. Array elements 0 through NumberOfProcessIdsInList– 1 contain valid process identifiers.
